title: Martha Pink Pearl Necklace
description: This collection echoes the bold and lavish design of the iconic Ziegfeld Theatre and the elegance of the Jazz Age.

title: Daisy Pearl Necklace
description: Freshwater cultured pearls with a sterling silver clasp. Meticulously matched pearls form this timeless design.

title: Spring Rings
description: Rose, rose, on rose, on rose, on rose and a whole lotta sparkle! This rose gold-plated ring set is absolutely fabulous.

title: Flower Rings
description: Flower, on flower, on flower and a whole lotta sparkle! This rose gold-plated ring set is absolutely fabulous.

title: Sparkling Freehand Necklace
description: Our freehand heart symbolizes 'perfectly imperfect' true love. Hand-finished in sterling silver, 14k rose gold plating.

title: Muse Pearl Necklace
description: A beautiful tribute to the olive branch, a symbol of peace, abundance. Original designs copyrighted by Paloma Picasso.

title: Golden Snitch Stud Earrings
description: Luckily and hopefully, catching a pair of these Golden Snitches is not half as difficult as out on the Quidditch field.

title: Vintage Circle Stud Earrings
description: Earrings combine solitaire studs with detachable jackets,and can dress them up with their halos for instance glamour.

title: Daisy Rose Necklace sets
description: Our freehand heart symbolizes 'perfectly imperfect' true love. Hand-finished in sterling silver and 14k rose gold plating.

title: Freshwater Pearl Necklace
description: The best seller set. Sophisticated yet edgy, this necklace is a luxurious mix of lustrous pearls and bold sterling goal.
